Summary: The 2025 Bank of China Global Campus Recruitment Program is looking for Junior Managers in three different areas: Front office, Middle and Back office, and Information Technology. Candidates must have a Bachelor's degree or above, be analytical, diligent, and possess good interpersonal skills. They must also be bilingual in English and Chinese. The program offers opportunities to work in various areas of banking and has a global reach. Applicants must graduate between 2024 and 2025 and send their CV to [REDACTED_EMAIL].
